question: Battle of Pratapgarh was fought between Shivaji and which of the following king?
explanation: Shivajiâ€™s military conquests made him a legendary figure in the Maratha region, and many locals came forward to join his army. He fought in the Battle of Pratapgarh with Afzal Khan who represented Adil Shah of Bijapur in which Shivaji killed Afzal Khan with his tiger claws and became a local hero.
